TCName.name: emergencyPREQ_VendorArticle
TCName.supplier: SELECT DISTINCT LIFNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE LIFNR NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT LIFNR FROM ZWOWC_ROSTER_DATE) AND RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG ='Y' AND LIFNR LIKE '00%'
TCName.rosterdate: select * from ZWOWC_ROSTER_DATE where roster_date in (select(today())) and lifnr ='supplier'
TCName.article: select master.matnr,listing.lifnr,listing.perpetual_flag,listing.alc_status,listing.article_om,master.pbd_ind,listing.random_weight_flg,master.random_weight_flg from zwowc_article_listing listing,zwowc_article_master master where master.matnr = listing.matnr and listing.alc_status not in ('DA','ES','EC') and listing.lifnr = 'supplier' and listing.random_weight_flg = 'N' and master.pbd_ind = 'isPBD'
TCName.randArticle: select master.matnr,listing.lifnr,listing.perpetual_flag,listing.alc_status,listing.article_om,master.pbd_ind,listing.random_weight_flg,master.random_weight_flg from zwowc_article_listing listing,zwowc_article_master master where master.matnr = listing.matnr and listing.alc_status not in ('DA','ES','EC') and listing.lifnr = 'supplier' and listing.random_weight_flg = 'Y' and master.random_weight_flg ='Y'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meins FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: manualPREQVendorArticle_WithRoster
TCName.supplier: SELECT ZAL.MATNR, roster_date_1 AS "Delivery Roster", delivery_date_1 AS "Next Delivery",delivery_date_2 AS "Following Delivery",lwdr.lifnr AS "Supplier" FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_ROSTER_DATE LWDR JOIN SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (ZAL.LIFNR = LWDR.LIFNR) and ZAL.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY='1'
TCName.article: SELECT ZAL.MATNR, roster_date_1 AS "Delivery Roster", delivery_date_1 AS "Next Delivery",delivery_date_2 AS "Following Delivery" FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_ROSTER_DATE LWDR JOIN SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (ZAL.LIFNR = LWDR.LIFNR) and ZAL.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY='1' and lwdr.lifnr = 'supplier'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meinh FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.getArticle: SELECT MASTER.MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LIST,ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE LIST.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND LIST.MATNR = DEPT.MATNR AND DEPT.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND DEPT.DEPT = '30'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: manualPREQGNVendor_withSingleVN
TCName.article: SELECT MASTER.MATNR,DEPT.DEPT_NAME,list.lifnr FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LIST,ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE LIST.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND LIST.MATNR = DEPT.MATNR AND DEPT.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND DEPT.DEPT NOT IN ('45') AND LIST.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY = '1' and list.lifnr in ('supplier') AND LIST.ALC_STATUS IN ('NA','RA') ORDER BY DEPT_NAME ASC
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: manualPREQVendor_multipleGSSingleVN
TCName.supplier: select a.matnr, lifnr from zwowc_article_listing a, zwowc_article_master b where lifnr in (select lifnr from zwowc_gs_vendor group by lifnr HAVING count(*) > 1) and a.matnr = b.matnr
TCName.article: select a.matnr, lifnr from zwowc_article_listing a, zwowc_article_master b where lifnr in (select lifnr from zwowc_gs_vendor group by lifnr HAVING count(*) > 1) and a.matnr = b.matnr and lifnr = 'supplier'
TCName.getArticle: SELECT MASTER.MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LIST,ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE LIST.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND LIST.MATNR = DEPT.MATNR AND DEPT.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND DEPT.DEPT = '30'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meins FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: OrderUpdationOfSugoSTO_ZUBW
TCName.articledetails: select distinct(info.matnr),master.article_desc,info.meins,soh.store_soh,info.menge,info.article_om,stock.soo,stock.sit from LOCAL_ORDER_PO_INFO info,local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM uom,zwowc_article_master master, local_wow_stock_info stock,ZWOWC_ART_SALES_PRICE sales where info.ebeln = 'order_no' and info.matnr = soh.article and master.matnr = info.matnr and stock.matnr = info.matnr
TCName.article: select soh.article from local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING listing,zwowc_article_master master where master.matnr = listing.matnr and master.matnr = soh.article and listing.lifnr in (select lifnr from ZWOWC_VENDOR_MASTER where lifnr_trim = 'suppliername') and soh.store_soh > 0 and listing.alc_status in ('RA','NA') and listing.PS_ARTICLE_STATUS ='' and listing.PERPETUAL_FLAG = 'Y' and master.mtart = 'HAWA' and master.PBD_IND = 'N'
TCName.randKGarticle: select soh.article from local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING listing,zwowc_article_master master where master.matnr = listing.matnr and master.matnr = soh.article and listing.lifnr in (select lifnr from ZWOWC_VENDOR_MASTER where lifnr_trim = 'suppliername') and soh.store_soh > 0 and listing.alc_status in ('RA','NA') and listing.PS_ARTICLE_STATUS ='' and listing.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG = 'randFlag' and master.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG = 'Y' and listing.PERPETUAL_FLAG = 'Y'
TCName.blockText: select matnr,blckt from ZWOWO_PREQ where banfn = 'order_no'

TCName.name: OrderUpdationOfSugoPREQ_ZSW
TCName.article: select soh.article from local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING listing,zwowc_article_master master where master.matnr = listing.matnr and master.matnr = soh.article and listing.lifnr in (select lifnr from ZWOWC_VENDOR_MASTER where lifnr_trim = 'suppliername') and soh.store_soh > 0 and listing.alc_status in ('RA','NA') and listing.PS_ARTICLE_STATUS ='' and listing.PERPETUAL_FLAG = 'Y' and master.mtart = 'HAWA' and master.PBD_IND = 'N'
TCName.randKGarticle: select soh.article from local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING listing,zwowc_article_master master where master.matnr = listing.matnr and master.matnr = soh.article and listing.lifnr in (select lifnr from ZWOWC_VENDOR_MASTER where lifnr_trim = 'suppliername') and soh.store_soh > 0 and listing.alc_status in ('RA','NA') and listing.PS_ARTICLE_STATUS ='' and listing.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG = 'randFlag' and master.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG = 'Y' and listing.PERPETUAL_FLAG = 'Y'
TCName.articlecount: select count(distinct matnr) from ZWOWO_PREQ where banfn = 'order_no'
TCName.blockText: select matnr,blckt from ZWOWO_PREQ where banfn = 'order_no'
TCName.articledetails: select distinct(info.matnr),master.article_desc,info.meins,soh.store_soh,info.menge,info.article_om,stock.soo,stock.sit,uom.meins --convert(double,info.article_om) || ' ' || uom.meins as om from ZWOWO_PREQ info,local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM uom,zwowc_article_master master, local_wow_stock_info stock,ZWOWC_ART_SALES_PRICE sales where info.banfn = 'order_no' and info.matnr = soh.article and master.matnr = info.matnr and info.matnr=uom.matnr and stock.matnr = info.matnr and uom.order_uom_ind = 'Y'

TCName.name: OrderUpdationOfSugoPREQ_ZSP
TCName.articlecount: select count(distinct matnr) from ZWOWO_PREQ where banfn = 'order_no'
TCName.blockText: select matnr,blckt from ZWOWO_PREQ where banfn = 'order_no'
TCName.articledetails: select distinct(info.matnr),master.article_desc,info.meins,soh.store_soh,info.menge,info.article_om,stock.soo,stock.sit,uom.meins --convert(double,info.article_om) || ' ' || uom.meins as om from ZWOWO_PREQ info,local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM uom,zwowc_article_master master, local_wow_stock_info stock,ZWOWC_ART_SALES_PRICE sales where info.banfn = 'order_no' and info.matnr = soh.article and master.matnr = info.matnr and info.matnr=uom.matnr and stock.matnr = info.matnr and uom.order_uom_ind = 'Y'

TCName.articledetails: select distinct(info.matnr),master.article_desc,info.meins,soh.store_soh,info.menge,info.article_om,stock.soo,stock.sit,uom.meins --convert(double,info.article_om) || ' ' || uom.meins as om from ZWOWO_PREQ info,local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM uom,zwowc_article_master master, local_wow_stock_info stock,ZWOWC_ART_SALES_PRICE sales where info.banfn = 'order_no' and info.matnr = soh.article and master.matnr = info.matnr and info.matnr=uom.matnr and stock.matnr = info.matnr and uom.order_uom_ind = 'Y'

TCName.name: OrderUpdationByAddingArticleByEAN
TCName.article: select ean.EAN11 from local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING listing,zwowc_article_master master,zwowc_article_ean ean where master.matnr = listing.matnr and ean.matnr=listing.matnr and master.matnr = soh.article and listing.lifnr in (select lifnr from ZWOWC_VENDOR_MASTER where lifnr_trim = 'suppliername') and soh.store_soh > 0 and listing.alc_status in ('RA','NA') and listing.PS_ARTICLE_STATUS ='' and listing.PERPETUAL_FLAG = 'Y' and master.mtart = 'HAWA' and master.PBD_IND = 'N'
TCName.randKGarticle: select ean.EAN11 from local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING listing,zwowc_article_master master,zwowc_article_ean ean where master.matnr = listing.matnr and ean.matnr=listing.matnr and master.matnr = soh.article and listing.lifnr in (select lifnr from ZWOWC_VENDOR_MASTER where lifnr_trim = 'suppliername') and soh.store_soh > 0 and listing.alc_status in ('RA','NA') and listing.PS_ARTICLE_STATUS ='' and listing.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG = 'randFlag' and master.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG = 'Y' and listing.PERPETUAL_FLAG = 'Y'
TCName.articlecount: select count(distinct matnr) from ZWOWO_PREQ where banfn = 'order_no'
TCName.blockText: select matnr,blckt from ZWOWO_PREQ where banfn = 'order_no'
TCName.articledetails: select distinct(info.matnr),master.article_desc,info.meins,soh.store_soh,info.menge,info.article_om,stock.soo,stock.sit,uom.meins --convert(double,info.article_om) || ' ' || uom.meins as om from ZWOWO_PREQ info,local_wow_soh soh,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM uom,zwowc_article_master master, local_wow_stock_info stock,ZWOWC_ART_SALES_PRICE sales where info.banfn = 'order_no' and info.matnr = soh.article and master.matnr = info.matnr and info.matnr=uom.matnr and stock.matnr = info.matnr and uom.order_uom_ind = 'Y'

select article,store_soh, store_soh_rand_wght from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'

select OPTM.EBELN,OPTM.MATNR,OPTM.MENGE,OPTM.MEINS,ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, ZAL.PI_OM,OPTM.ARTICLE_OM, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, ZAM.TEMPERATURE_IND FROM ZWOWO_PO_ITM OPTM JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (OPTM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (OPTM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE OPTM.EBELN = 'ord_no';
select OPTM.MATNR,ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND FROM ZWOWO_PO_ITM OPTM JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (OPTM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (OPTM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE OPTM.EBELN = 'ord_no'
select count(*),floor(sum(OPTM.MENGE)) FROM ZWOWO_PO_ITM OPTM JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (OPTM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (OPTM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE OPTM.EBELN = 'ord_no'
select distinct a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_master a,saap.zwowc_article_uom b,saap.zwowc_article_ean c,saap.zwowc_article_listing d,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.matnr=e.matnr and a.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='Y' and d.source_of_supply='1' and d.lifnr='Vendor_No'and d.pi_om>1
select distinct a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_master a,saap.zwowc_article_uom b,saap.zwowc_article_ean c,saap.zwowc_article_listing d,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.matnr=e.matnr and d.source_of_supply='1' and d.lifnr='Vendor_No' and mtart='HAWA'

TCName.name: OrdersCancellationFromBrowser
TCName.OpenPreq: select banfn from zwowo_preq where status='O' and bsart='ZMW' and source_of_supply='source1' group by banfn having count(distinct banfn ) =1

TCName.name: OrderCancellationFromBrowser
TCName.PONo: select * from ZWOWO_PO_HDR where DATEFORMAT(on_show_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') < DATEFORMAT(today(),'MM/DD/YYYY') and source_of_supply='source1' and STATUS='A' and rcvd_flag is null
